name: Hits The Fan
description:
Hits The Fan is a first person endless runner where the player parkours through a procedurally generated obstacle course. Every time the player starts a new level the layout, color and type of obstacles will be different than before. The player will also need to keep moving as death is ever approaching. 

Credits

  • Sam Lower - Gameplay Programming and Design 
  • Ian Copenhaver - Environment and Prop Artist
  • Jacob Marroquin -  Creative Designer and 2D Artist
  • Isabelle Pacis - Concept Artist
  • Lucas Martin - Concept Artist
